transform_def.name: designed22
transform_def.string: let r = 1 / length(p_in) z = cos(p_in.y * sin(length(p_in)) / tan(abs(p_in.y) + abs(p_in.x))) / tan(p_in.x * sin(length(p_in)) / tan(p_in.x)) * tan(p_in.y * sin(length(p_in)) * exp(abs(p_in.y))) / length(p_in) con1 = abs(z) < r con2 = abs(z) > r in (if if fill > 0.0 then con1 else con2 then p_in else vec2(0.0)) * weight
